answers.answer: Lol good luck I hope u pass it cause I failed mine.
Can u sip water and lay down
They said only small sips of water. ... I didn't throw up now I'm just waiting on my results
I haven't had that test? What is it for?
So glad you passed.Definitely makes life easier to know you don't have gestational diabetes.

The test is to find out if you need to test your blood sugar..I failed my test and unfortunately it is not cheap to test your blood sugar 4times a day.Not to mention the additional appointment you have to go on.. it's not a preference.The test is awful, I too wanted to throw up,got seriously dizzy and weakend.After my test (even after having a meal) I was so exhausted that I slept for 24h..I hope you pass your test.It is hard.. but by far harder having to test your blood all the time and keep a food diary/diet.Good luck!
I'm so happy I passed thanks ladies good luck on your pregnancies I have 90 days left!!!

question: I'm here doing the three hour test and I just drank the cola and it ***** I hate it I feel like throwing up and I can't cus then I would have to start all over again lol.... and I can't eat and I'm getting dizzy... I get dizzy when I can't eat and I have 3 hrs left I hate this hopefully I pass... next pregnancy if I ever get pregnant I think I would just rather test my blood sugar levels everyday than doing this test again...
title: 3 hr test
